scenario_text.value: What’re you doing, Aoi?

Just cleaning. I’m not sure what else to do
at a time like this.

Times like these make the dirty spots that
much more irritating!
Yeah, I think I get what you mean.

Plus, this place is full of memories for all
of us.
That’s why I want to keep it tidy.
I’ll help, too!

Thank you. In that case, would you take care
of the dusting over there?
Sure, no problem.
Um, Takuma...
Yeah?

...Don’t you think it’s a miracle we made it
this far without losing anyone?
It’s no miracle.

Everyone’s been working super hard...
Especially you, Aoi.

So it’s not a miracle, but proof of our
efforts... That’s what I think.

Especially me?
I don’t think I did anything special...

(She’s being modest. Aoi’s tried so hard, as
a leader, a mother to everyone...)
(What should I say to Aoi?)
You’re like a mom to us.
You’re like a leader to us.
A mom to all of us.

That’s not true, Aoi. You’re like a mom
to all of us.
A mom...
I think a mom like you would be great!

I don’t think I’ve done anything so
praiseworthy...
You always take care of everyone, don’t you?

Ah, but I guess a mother’s gotta be much
older, huh? So maybe...a big sister?

...Either way, I’m happy that you hold me in
such high esteem.
That’s only because you’ve earned it, Aoi.
...Thanks, Takuma.
A leader to all of us.

That’s not true, Aoi. You’re like a leader
to all of us.
I don’t consider myself any kind of leader.

But you held everyone together while I was
gone, didn’t you?

No, I... Shuuji was much more of a leader
than I was.

Well of course he’s a leader, but I think
you’re just as much a leader as he is.
Me, a leader?

Yeah. No one said there’s gotta be just one.
You’ve definitely done your part! So...

Thanks, Aoi. I was able to see everyone again
because of you.
...Well, if you’re gonna go that far...

I might have gained a little confidence.
Is that all right?
Of course it is! What you’ve done is amazing!
Takuma... Thank you.

But you’ve been making every effort as well,
haven’t you, Takuma?
Huh? Me?

Yes. You’ve been working just as hard for
everyone as I have.

It’s safe to say everyone’s been doing their
best here.

Yes, I agree. If we had lost even a single
one of us...
I don’t think we would be here right now.

Both this world and ours could have ended,
with us having no idea how they’re connected.

We wouldn’t have known about the professor,
or Renamon...

Renamon always thought of Miyuki, so long
that the professor grew into an adult...

I know... To be thinking about a single person
for such a long time...

Is that a happy experience? Or an unhappy
one?

(I can’t imagine such a long time. Still,
looking at Renamon and the professor...)
(I should tell Aoi it’s...)
Happiness, I’m sure.
Unhappiness, maybe.
Happiness, I’m sure.

I’d say it’s happiness. If it’s someone you
can think about so much for so long...

I’d say that’s not the type of person you
meet every day.

You’re right... I guess that’s why Renamon
couldn’t forgive the professor.

Well, even those two have come to understand
each other.

Coming to an understanding despite being at
odds... Isn’t that wonderful?

Yeah. I want to do the same with the Four
Sovereign Monsters. If we can do that...

Don’t worry, Takuma. Your wish will reach
them, I’m sure of it.
Unhappiness, maybe.

Maybe it’s unhappiness. Renamon didn’t look
too happy, after all...

The desire to protect...transformed into
something different without her noticing.

But Renamon isn’t in the wrong. That feeling
of wanting to protect Miyuki wasn’t a lie.

Yes... Maybe that’s why Renamon and the
professor came to understand each other.

Oh, shoot! All this talk made me forget about
the cleaning.
Shall we get back to it?
That should do it.
You missed a spot, Takuma.

Oops, you’re right. Cleaning’s harder than
I thought.

Hee hee... Still, you’re pretty good at this.
Some people just have no sense for it.
Really?
Hee hee, yes, really.
Um, Takuma...
What’s up?

Once everything’s settled... Will you still
hang out with me like this?

(What’s this? I’d say it’s obvious, but
I don’t exactly have proof or anything.)
(How should I respond to Aoi?)
Of course!
As much as I can.
Of course!
Of course! I mean, we’re friends, right?

Yes, you’re right... I look forward to the
day all this ends, then.
Yeah, me too!
As much as I can.
As much as I can.

We have no idea what’s waiting for us ahead,
after all...
I can’t say anything for sure at this point.

...There are plenty of trials ahead of us
back in our world too, huh?

Still, after everything we’ve been through in
this world, I’m sure it’ll all work out.
Yes, I think so, too.

*whew* That’s enough cleaning for now.
I should get ready.
See you later, Takuma.
Yeah, until then.

Things are about to get tough for us, but
we’ll get through it. All of us, together.
